column4: hello all-- how do i stop a demon once i've started it?  (i've started svnserver but i don't know how to stop it)
uhhh-- doesn't that kill all?  all processes?  i just want to kill a specific demon-- gracefully if possible
killall kills everything with the name you say, so killall apache2 will kill apache2, killall firefox-bin kills firefox
it should expect to get that signal.. but yeah asking it first is usually better than telling it ;)
